m_szDocSumamry: News:2011:January-March:Best Exotic Free Energy Technologies From PESWiki News:2011:April-June:Best Exotic Free Energy Technologies - going forward in time March, 2011 Featured / Best Exotic FE : Nuclear > Cold Fusion > Rossi > Breakdown to Breakthrough is Possible Now - Astronaut and Professor Brian O'Leary says that burning uranium and hydrocarbons is very, very bad for our health and the environment, and is utterly unnecessary. Clean breakthrough energy is on its way with the Rossi Cold Fusion Energy Catalyzer likely to come first. (PESN; March 25, 2011) Featured / Best Exotic FE : Nuclear
